The Bigger Shift: The Knowledge Economy Is Changing

This isn’t just about coding. This is about the future of work.

For decades, success depended on what you knew. The best opportunities went to those who could memorize, analyze, and specialize in fields where knowledge was scarce.

Now?
✅ AI recalls everything instantly.
✅ It analyzes, summarizes, and writes better than most people.
✅ It codes at a level that makes software development faster than ever.
✅ It generates ideas that challenge traditional creativity.

If your edge was knowing things, that edge is disappearing.
